import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Brain, Clock, Users, Star, Filter, Search, Play, Trophy, Zap } from 'lucide-react'; import { GlowingCards, GlowingCard } from '../components/lightswind/glowing-cards.tsx'; const PublicQuizzes = () => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState('all'); const [sortBy, setSortBy] = useState('popular'); const categories = [ { id: 'all', name: 'All Categories', count: 156 }, { id: 'math', name: 'Mathematics', count: 45 }, { id: 'science', name: 'Science', count: 32 }, { id: 'history', name: 'History', count: 28 }, { id: 'language', name: 'Language Arts', count: 23 }, { id: 'geography', name: 'Geography', count: 18 }, { id: 'art', name: 'Art & Culture', count: 10 }, ]; const quizzes = [ { id: 1, title: 'Basic Algebra Fundamentals', description: 'Master the basics of algebra with interactive problems and step-by-step solutions.', category: 'math', difficulty: 'beginner', duration: 15, questions: 20, rating: 4.8, participants: 1250, image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1635070041078-e363dbe005cb?w=400&h=200&fit=crop', tags: ['algebra', 'equations', 'variables'], glowColor: '#3b82f6' // Blue for math }, { id: 2, title: 'World War II History', description: 'Comprehensive quiz covering major events, battles, and figures of World War II.', category: 'history', difficulty: 'intermediate', duration: 25, questions: 35, rating: 4.6, participants: 890, image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1578662996442-48f60103fc96?w=400&h=200&fit=crop', tags: ['world war', 'history', 'battles'], glowColor: '#f59e0b' // Yellow for history }, { id: 3, title: 'Photosynthesis Process', description: 'Learn about how plants convert sunlight into energy through photosynthesis.', category: 'science', difficulty: 'beginner', duration: 12, questions: 15, rating: 4.7, participants: 2100, image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1416879595882-3373a0480b5b?w=400&h=200&fit=crop', tags: ['biology', 'plants', 'energy'], glowColor: '#22c55e' // Green for science }, { id: 4, title: 'Grammar Mastery', description: 'Test your knowledge of English grammar rules, tenses, and sentence structure.', category: 'language', difficulty: 'intermediate', duration: 20, questions: 30, rating: 4.5, participants: 1680, image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1481627834876-b7833e8f5570?w=400&h=200&fit=crop', tags: ['grammar', 'english', 'language'], glowColor: '#9333ea' // Purple for language }, { id: 5, title: 'World Capitals Challenge', description: 'Challenge yourself to identify capitals of countries around the world.', category: 'geography', difficulty: 'advanced', duration: 18, questions: 25, rating: 4.9, participants: 3200, image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1469474968028-56623f02e42e?w=400&h=200&fit=crop', tags: ['capitals', 'countries', 'world'], glowColor: '#06b6d4' // Cyan for geography }, { id: 6, title: 'Renaissance Art & Artists', description: 'Explore the masterpieces and artists of the Renaissance period.', category: 'art', difficulty: 'intermediate', duration: 22, questions: 28, rating: 4.4, participants: 750, image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1541961017774-22349e4a1262?w=400&h=200&fit=crop', tags: ['art', 'renaissance', 'paintings'], glowColor: '#ec4899' // Pink for art } ]; const filteredQuizzes = quizzes.filter(quiz => { const matchesSearch = quiz.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || quiz.description.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || quiz.tags.some(tag => tag.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())); const matchesCategory = selectedCategory === 'all' || quiz.category === selectedCategory; return matchesSearch && matchesCategory; }); const getDifficultyColor = (difficulty) => { switch (difficulty) { case 'beginner': return 'bg-green-100 text-green-800'; case 'intermediate': return 'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800'; case 'advanced': return 'bg-red-100 text-red-800'; default: return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'; } }; const getCategoryIcon = (category) => { switch (category) { case 'math': return 'üî¢'; case 'science': return 'üî¨'; case 'history': return 'üìö'; case 'language': return 'üìù'; case 'geography': return 'üåç'; case 'art': return 'üé®'; default: return 'üìñ'; } }; return (

); }; export default PublicQuizzes;
